CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the In-Store Promotion stage positioned above or below the Taste Testing stage?
SRP.A: The In-Store Promotion stage is positioned {below} the Taste Testing stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Retail Placement?
VE.A: The value of stage Retail Placement is {1854}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Taste Testing?
VE.A: The value of stage Taste Testing is {4438}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Taste Testing, with a value of {4438}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Customer Purchase, with a value of {1299}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement?
SC.A: Decreased by {886} Thousand Bottles from stage Launch in Market to stage Retail Placement.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market?
SC.A: Decreased by {1698} Thousand Bottles from stage Taste Testing to stage Launch in Market.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 3589? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 1650? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {In-Store Promotion} stage has {1447}, the {Customer Purchase} stage has {1299}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 1373 and 3589? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Launch in Market} stage has {2740}, the {Retail Placement} stage has {1854}, the {In-Store Promotion} stage has {1447}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase, or from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Launch in Market} to {Retail Placement} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market, or from stage In-Store Promotion to Customer Purchase?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to {Launch in Market} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Launch in Market to Retail Placement, from stage Retail Placement to In-Store Promotion, or from stage Taste Testing to Launch in Market?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Taste Testing} to stage {Launch in Market} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Taste Testing} and {Launch in Market} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {In-Store Promotion} and {Customer Purchase} stages.
